resources.string: Venus is the hottest planet in our solar system.
A day on Venus is longer than a year on Venus.
Neptune is the closest planet to the Sun.
The Great Wall of China is visible from the Moon.
Saturn is known for its stunning rings.
The Milky Way is a spiral galaxy.
Mercury is the closest planet to the Sun.
Mars is known as the Red Planet.
Jupiter is the largest planet in our solar system.
The Moon is Earths natural satellite.
The Milky Way is our galaxy.
A solar eclipse occurs when the Earth blocks the Sun.
